detail_desc: Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and covered press-studs down the front. Lined.

V-neck blouse in soft, patterned fabric with a draped, wrapover front that has covered buttons at one side. Buttons on the inside and at the top, and long puff sleeves with reinforced shoulder sections.

Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a paper bag waist that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back. Pleats at the front, a zip fly and a contrasting colour belt in a double layer of twill with metal D-rings. Back pockets, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
